name: Hope in vain
description:
They promised me something when i was young
the key to being able to get through everything in this world is to live this life without hesitation
yes they imagine my future will be beautiful
about a man who becomes someone with a diploma and nine years of seeking knowledge to live a decent life.
they carved these dreams, then sealed in a dark room. life is not like enjoying a glass of warm tea on the terrace of the house. there is only black and white,
there is only light and darkness alternately so that I can't breathe this breath. all this is just hope in vain
